Are you looking for a fast & easy way to find jobs and create targeted Cover Letter proposals for Upwork? Then you need PouncerAI - a premium AI tool designed for elite freelancers.

- Immediate Job Alerts in your browser so you can find jobs fast
- One-click proposal generation directly on the Apply page
- AI Proposal Templates tailored to you & the job
- No more copying and pasting from AI & text files to create a cover letter proposal!

If you are serious about getting more work from Upwork, then you need PouncerAI. Start your free  trial at https://pouncer.ai

===By Freelancers…for Freelancers===

The genesis for PouncerAI came from the frustrations my partner and I had spending hours every week copying, pasting, and refining our cover letters just to apply for a freelancing job on Upwork. 

So we created PouncerAI to make it easier for freelancers to get more work fast with Cover Letter proposals that get a client's attention.

===How It Works===

Once you are ready to apply for a job on Upwork, PouncerAI is ready to get to work.

PouncerAI combines your profile information, the job description, and AI prompts to generate a custom-tailored cover letter that is unique to you and entices the client to contact you!

You no longer need to have multiple browser tabs open so you can copy and paste from other AI tools to Upwork. PouncerAI uses ChatGPT to craft a cover letter that combines everything you need into one click of a button.

But there's more... You can create your own AI prompts in PouncerAI so that your proposals are exactly the way you want them.

===Make Your Cover Letters Stand Out===

Add a little "flair" to your cover letter proposals with your Upstyler Toolbar. Go beyond simple emojis by adding:

- bold & italic text and heading
- unique bullet points
- any Unicode symbol
- and a full emoji library 

While Upwork does not support RTF format, it does support Unicode characters...and the Upstyler Toolbar makes it easy to add them.

===Try It Today===

PouncerAI is the perfect tool for freelancers that are serious about getting more work from Upwork, fast. So download it today…so you can spend more time doing what you do best and less time applying for work on Upwork.
